simplemathr

Alan Arnholt
2016-02-01

simplemathr Version 0.1.1

Installation

To install this package use:

devtools::install_github('alanarnholt/simplemathr', build_vignettes = TRUE)

Bug Reports

Please report bugs and suggestions to https://github.com/alanarnholt/simplemathr/issues
